title: Garrys.Mod.v14.07.11
description:
===========================================
Garry's Mod v14.07.11
===========================================

This is a vanilla (no addons, no content) release
which is fully working and updated as of 13 July 2014.


===========================================
How to run the game
===========================================

1. Extract the rar file anywhere you want it

2. Exit Steam (may sometimes not be needed)

3. Run the game by double-clicking on the file called START

4. If you get an error saying that a DLL file is missing,
   install the file in the redist folder

5. Don't forget to seed!


===========================================
How to change in-game name
===========================================

1. Open the file LumaEmu.ini

2. Replace LumaEmu with you wanted name

3. Save the file and restart the game


===========================================
How to get content from other games
===========================================

1. Download/get hold of the game's content folder
   (eg. "cstrike", "tf2" etc.)

2. Place it directly in your Garry's Mod folder

3. Start the game

4. Click the little game-controller to the
   bottom right

5. Tick the box for the game you want to mount

6. Launch a game and the content is now available


===========================================
Where to get addons
===========================================

* Gaddons.org
* Freesteam.org
* Gmodportal.ru

===========================================
